HomePage.title: Mirror Hours & Their Meanings
HomePage.description: Discover the mystical meanings behind mirror hours and their spiritual significance. Learn what it means when you see 11:11, 22:22, and other mirror hours.
HomePage.subtitle: All Mirror Hours & Their Meanings

hero.title: Discover the Hidden Messages Behind Mirror Hours
hero.description: Mirror hours are when the hour and minute numbers mirror each other. Explore their meanings and symbolism.

categories.fullMirror: Full Mirror hours are times when the hour and minute numbers are the same (e.g., 11:11, 22:22). They are usually associated with positive messages and synchronicities.
categories.reverseMirror: Reverse Mirror hours are times when the hour and minute numbers are reversed (e.g., 12:21, 05:50). They are usually associated with warnings, awareness, or inner messages.
categories.tripleMirror: Triple Mirror hours are times when a number is repeated three times (e.g., 01:11, 03:33). They are usually associated with strong energies, spiritual guidance, and attention-grabbing messages.
categories.default: This hour might have a special meaning.

notFound.title: Mirror Hour Not Found
notFound.description: The mirror hour you're looking for doesn't exist or hasn't been documented yet.
